knimeNode.name: InChI to RDKit
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts InChI codes to RDKit molecules.

fullDescription.intro: Converts InChI codes to RDKit molecules. Additionally, it offers options to generate extra information about the generation process (return code, message, log message).
fullDescription.option: The input column with InChI codes.
Enable to remove the specified source column from the result table.

option.name: New column name for RDKit molecules

fullDescription.option: The name of the new column, which will contain the RDKit molecules.
Enable to sanitize the generated molecule.
Enable to remove hydrogens from the generated molecule.

option.name: New column name prefix for extra information

fullDescription.option: The prefix of column names, which will contain the extra information about the conversion.
Enable to also generated a column that contains the return code of the InChI code conversion.
Enable to also generated a column that contains a message generated during the InChI code conversion.
Enable to also generated a column that contains a log message of the InChI code conversion.
